prompts.title: Prompt 1: Animal Personality Analysis
prompts.text: Based upon my interactions in the last month, what kind of animal would you describe me as. Note: I am presenting this in front of a live audience!

prompts.title: Prompt 2: Investment Company Applications
prompts.text: How might these tools be useful in an investment company context. Give some examples.

prompts.title: Prompt 4: Investment Firm Document Summary
prompts.text:
Instruction: Summarize this document clearly and concisely for internal use.
----
Context: I am an associate at an investment firm preparing a short note for the portfolio management team. They need to understand the company's latest performance and financial position at a glance.
----
Constraints: Structure the output as three short sections:
- Performance: Key revenue, growth, or margin highlights.
- Financials: Notable figures such as cash flow, EBITDA, or balance sheet movements.
- Outlook / Risks: Any forward-looking guidance or material risks mentioned.

prompts.title: Prompt 6: AI in Healthcare Analysis
prompts.text: Give me an analysis of emerging applications of AI in preventive and value-based healthcare

prompts.title: Prompt 7: Kinnevik Healthcare Research Brief
prompts.text:
Role:
You are an investment associate at Kinnevik researching innovation in healthcare.
----
Instruction:
Analyse emerging applications of AI in preventive and value-based healthcare, including diagnostics, care coordination, and population health.
----
Context:
This research will inform portfolio strategy for Kinnevik's digital health holdings.
----
Example:
Use a concise, professional tone – similar to a short internal memo to the investment team – with 2–3 key findings under each section.
----
Constraints:
-Focus on developments from 2023–2025 in the US and Europe.
-Prioritize credible sources such as company filings, investor presentations, recognized research institutions, or tier-one publications (e.g., FierceHealthcare, Stat, Financial Times).
- Avoid speculative or opinion-based content; flag unverified claims.
----
Output:
Produce a 300–400 word research brief structured as follows:
- Opportunity – where AI is creating measurable value in prevention or care delivery.
- Key Players – 3–5 companies with short descriptions.
- Risks & Challenges – commercial, regulatory, or data-related constraints.
Include short source notes or citations at the end.
